title: Build A Game In Unity 5
desc: Hello all applicants!I'm looking for a game developer to build a game in Unity 5. Only the basic mechanics, controls and feel of the game will be built. Simple shapes that can be re-skinned will work. Below are the game characteristics that must be met.GAME CHARACTERISTICS-Classic SNAKE type game (Player is constantly moving in the current direction. Direction is changed by clicking elsewhere)-Game begins on a timer counting down, game ends when the timer reaches zero.-Picking up items increases the time on the timer.-Player moves at the same speed. Player speeds up or slows down when they hit certain areas of the map.-Random map generator-Isometric view ([url removed, login to view] gameplay). Please see attached screenshot for a visual of what isometric ([url removed, login to view]) looks like.-Simple leaderboard for "time lasted"Applicant:-Must be able to build all GAME CHARACTERISTICS listed above in Unity 5.-Have made a isometric ([url removed, login to view]) game before. Must provide proof in proposal. Preferably a game that can be played.Please contact for more clarification on the project. In your proposal do provide your bid and estimated time of completion.Thank you and good luck on your application!

title: Fix Offerwall listener bug in android application
desc: I am looking for somebody that is experienced with integrating offerwalls into android applications for virtual currency. I have a android application (created in android studio) that has 3 offerwalls integrated (adscend media, superrewards and offertoro), which generate virtual currency for the users. The application is set to show the overall currency count and record it in the web panel, but the new points are not added to the user score after an offer is completed. The ad network shows the completed offer  but the app freezes when updating the points until it is restarted. The application needs to be fixed so that users can properly complete offers in the offerwall and receive points (as well as them being recorded in the admin panel)

title: Mobile app
desc: I need an iPhone/iPad app. I already have a design for it, I just need it to be built.

title: Bulk Content Replication & Menu Linking Tool
desc: Current SituationMultiple categories are created and load with related duplicate articles, comprising main content, meta description and keywords.Each article is manually edited to amend a single or two word for main area, meta description and keywords from a pre-defined list, then saved to become a new article.Unique "single article menu" link is then created for each article per category.Menu link name is the same as the article title, but sometimes are shortened or changed altogether based on needs.Requirements from the New ToolCategory Naming: allow user to state category name, quantity required and any appended word list for uniqueness. So if the user needs 10 categories created they should be able to specify the category name and word list for creating unique categories.Eg... New Joomla category is called "Sample Instance" and list contains location details such as London, India, Australia, America...etc... The tool should be able to automate the creation of required new categories as "Sample Instance London", Sample List Australia..etc by a user single button click.Article Creation: Automate new article creation from the main article by selecting new words from the predefined word list and making changes to the keywords, meta description and main content by the single click of a button.Menu Creation: Create new menu title from each article title instance per category. Automate the association between the new article and correct menu title created by the press of a button.The tool should be able to create new menu category or select existing categories for the new menu link per article category.All new article and menu link must be published and not requiring users to carry out this activity.In essence, we need a tool that can automate the manual process currently being carried out to increase productivity.Please let me know if this makes sense and when you are available for a session to discuss.
